mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.created_at, m.username, c.name AS categoryName, cm.content AS commentContent, cm_writer.username AS commentWriter FROM post p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN comment cm ON cm.post_id = p.id LEFT JOIN member cm_writer ON cm.member_id = cm_writer.id WHERE p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cm.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
